  • Method Details

    • play

      public void play​(Server server, Server.PlayerHandler playerHandler) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Creates a thread for the timer. Depending on the player score, loads the correct level of difficulty list of questions and calls for the askQuestions method, verifying the level change conditions.
      Parameters:
      server - - server needed in the askQuestions method.
      playerHandler - - player handler needed to send messages to the player and get its score.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurs
      InterruptedException - If an interruption exception occurs

    • askQuestions

      public void askQuestions​(Timer timer, Server server, Server.PlayerHandler playerHandler, int difficultyScore, int maxCorrectScore) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Asks the player a given set of questions and deals with both answers [correct and incorrect] and commands.
      Parameters:
      timer - - timer needed to get the time left in the game and set timer in proportion to the thread sleep.
      server - - needed to the header method.
      playerHandler - - needed to send messages to the player and deal with commands.
      difficultyScore - - number of points for each correct answer giving in accordance to the difficulty of that same question.
      maxCorrectScore - - maximum amount of correct points needed to change difficulty level of questions.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurs
      InterruptedException - If an interruption exception occurs

    • gameOver

      public void gameOver​(Server server, Server.PlayerHandler playerHandler) throws InterruptedException
      Sends the final message of the game containing the final score, the number of correct answers and the total answers that he was given during the time set. Adds final players score to the score list and sets the highest score, resets booleans and removes the given player handler from the multiplayer list and prompts it back to the main menu.
      Parameters:
      server - - server needed to add the player's score to the score list, define highscore and remove player handler from the multiplayer list.
      playerHandler - - player handler needed to prompt user back with main menu.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If an interruption exception occurs

    • header

      public void header​(Timer timer, Server server, Server.PlayerHandler playerHandler)
      Creates a header with a graphical interface for each question containing the player's score, the time left to the end of the multiplayer game and the top/highest player score.
      Parameters:
      timer - - timer needed to get the time left in the game
      server - - server needed to get the top player's score
      playerHandler - - player handler needed to get the player's score
